relevance_explanation: The routine was correctly trimmed to only include steps and tool calls relevant to the customer. The logic for non-cancellable bookings was pruned correctly, as the booking is cancellable. Also, the loyalty branch was trimmed and expressed directly in the text.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic and tool calls for this customer were preserved. The routine correctly addresses the scenario where a cancellation is allowed and proceeds with calculating fees and processing refunds.
